author: FaeFox (Fae#0009)
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Gathering! Please ensure that your bot has the applications.commands permission (granted from the discord developer portal before inviting your bot).
This cog contains slash command(s).

NOTE: Discord may take up to an hour to register slash commands.
name: Gathering
short: Create a list of items for members to add or remove from.
description: Create a list of items for members to add or remove from. Originally made with FFXIV Free Company gathering in mind.
end_user_data_statement: This cog may store data such as member IDs in order to track member list contribution.
